meanings.definition: Wood from a broad-leaved tree, as distinguished from that of conifers.
meanings.sent1: The hardwood was used to build a sturdy table.
meanings.sent2: The hardwood floor in the living room looked beautiful.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the hardwood to build a tiny fort.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as solid as hardwood.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the hardwood cracking echoed through the forest.
